text: The Army of Tennessee was a Confederate field army during the American Civil War. It fought in the Western Theater for most of the war. It was formed from the Army of Mississippi in November 1862. It surrendered in April 1865 in North Carolina. Category:Confederate States of America Category:Armies Category:1862 establishments in the United States Category:1860s disestablishments in the United States Category:1865 disestablishments
title: Army of Tennessee
